overview: Fast-forward 23 years into the future. Sam's an adult now, and he's got a son of his own.  The long-awaited sequel to BURNER is coming later this year in 2018.  ORIGINAL FILM -> https://vimeo.com/126995088 SECOND DEGREE BURN TEASER -> https://burnerblog.weebly.com/home/burner-sequel-announced-official-teaser
title: BURNER: Second Degree Burn
